text: "Last time's radio show was really great!"

"The best thing about noctchill is how natural they are.
It's like they're not trying to be celebrities, in a good way."

"I find it hard to truly be myself. I'm always
worried about what my classmates or adults think."

"That's why I admire everyone in noctchill, especially
Madoka-chan, for being so strong and amazing."

"Even if they become incredibly successful
 I hope Madoka-chan stays just the way she is now."

"If she does, I feel like I can find
the courage to be myself too."

Ah... good job
Madoka, you're still here.
